meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
readingMnemonic:
Since this word is made up of a single kanji, it probably uses the kun'yomi reading. You haven't learned this reading yet, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

When do people tend to use the word <vocabulary>furthermore</vocabulary>? Right <reading>now</reading> (なお)!
